Message:
Granny Rosalie told me,
“In wishing to forget
the pain from your past,
you locked it away
inside your heart.

And now, that pain is
beginning to overflow.”

My Curse covers the land
in cursed flowers.

Flowers that look just like
the one Dad loved...

There are still seeds of
that flower left at my old house,
so I might learn something
by going back.

But, just trying to remember
Mom and Dad floods my mind
with the sight of their still bodies,
and the smell of burning flames...

My lord then grasped
my trembling hands.

“I can tell by looking at
the flowers in the garden.
Painful memories aren’t all that’s
in your heart, Natasha,” he said.

“There’s definitely something
else precious in there.
Let’s find them together.”
